commentBody: By some of the comments and questions, it makes me wonder if the judges have actually read any of the reports, transcripts of appeal hearings in the context of the time line or even understand the reality of PSI science of air pressure, or ever heard Ted Wells state that he did not Tom Brady's personal cell phone, and was provided a complete listing of all calls made or contacts.

replies.commentBody: Isn't up to the pats lawyers to educate the judges on these points? More likely they have reviewed the evidence and simple come to a conclusion that differs from that of laymen and fans.

Tom Brady's lawyers wasn't  given the opportunity to in this hearing based on the way the questions were asked, and the short shrift the Judges asking the questions gave him....Denny Chin came off totally ignorant and uninformed to the details and critical facts of the case that were all documented.
